description:
"Some strange force... ( ~ ) ...drags me against my will to these sad banks" :: {2020} :: pencil on inkjet prints, paper collage animation :: part of the second alterhen.art exhibition opening on December 15th, 2021 :: @annaxmalina :: annamalina.com 

-----

RED THREAD is an unfinished, ongoing work and part of my long-term research into pre-revolution Russian and Soviet cinema; it’s a quiet exploration of my longing, which spreads out across time, space and media & an attempt to weave new memories with my hands.
